content: Nostalgia’s in the air… While reading, and seeing old websites, I remembered Lycos and Altavista as seen through Netscape 0.91. These were two sites I used a lot for my searches back in 1990–91. Since I didn’t even know if they existed anymore, I tried them both. Lycos still works and has certainly changed a lot. Altavista changed as well. Now it is called Yahoo (it must have been acquired by them). :D Thanks for the smell of old times.
